description:
Mukai Naoya is in a relationship with Saki Saki, but another girl, Mizuse Nagisa, asks him out. He makes the unthinkable decision of asking them if they would be up for both dating him at the same time.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Even If That Isn`t the Right Way
Sore ga Tadashii Michi ja Nakutemo
それが正しい道じゃなくても
